TIDYSW5E.Exhaustion3: Disadvantage on Attack rolls and Saving Throws
TIDYSW5E.EditHint: Toggles visibility of add/delete buttons and empty sections
TIDYSW5E.EmptySection: This section is empty. Unlock the sheet to edit.
TIDYSW5E.GmOnlyEdit: Only your GM can edit this section.
TIDYSW5E.AttunementWarning: Attunement warning: You can't attune to more than {number} items!
TIDYSW5E.SearchHint: Just start to type what you are searching for.
TIDYSW5E.ItemCardsKeyHint: hold Key to interact with card.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.name: Show item info cards in all layouts.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsForAllItems.hint: Disable if you only want the slide out item info cards in grid layout.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsForNpcs.name: Show item info cards for NPCs/vehicles.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsForNpcs.hint: Disable if you don't want the slide out item info cards for NPCs/vehicles.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.name: Item info cards float next to cursor.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsAreFloating.hint: Enable to detach item info cards from sheet and float them next to the cursor. Best to use with delay. Also useful when sheet is popped out.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.name: Delay showing info cards.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsDelay.hint: The Item Card will show when you hover an item for the value in milliseconds (0 = no delay, 300 is default).

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.name: Key to hold for Item Card interaction.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ItemCardsFixKey.hint: Enter a key (e.g.: x) to use for item card interaction. Can be any key except function keys (ctrl, alt, etc.)

TIDYSW5E.Settings.SheetTheme.name: TidySW5e color theme.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.SheetTheme.hint: Use either the default light or alternate dark color theme of TidySW5e.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ClassicControls.name: Use classic item controls in list view.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ClassicControls.hint: Always shows item controls and disable right click menu. Only applies for PC item/power inventory in list layout.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.RollButtonsToCard.name: Show midiQol Item Buttons in item's info card
TIDYSW5E.Settings.RollButtonsToCard.hint: Per default roll buttons appear in the item's description. Enable to move them to the item's info card. Works in all layout modes.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitLabels.name: Show Trait Labels.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitLabels.hint: By default only icons are shown for traits. Enable to display labels as well.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.PlayerName.name: Show player name.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.PlayerName.hint: Enable to show a field for the player name below the character's name.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ClassList.name: Hide character class list.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ClassList.hint: Enable to hide the class list below the character's name.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.JournalTab.name: Hide character journal.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.JournalTab.hint: Enable to hide the journal tab.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.InspirationAnimation.name: Inanimate inspiration tracker.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.InspirationAnimation.hint: Enable to turn off inspiration tracker glow animation.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.HideIfZero.name: Hide exhaustion and inspiration tracker on 0.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.HideIfZero.hint: Enable to hide exhaustion and inspiration if 0. Will show on hover.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.InspirationOnHover.name: Show inspiration indicator only on hover.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.InspirationOnHover.hint: Enable to only show the inspiration indicator when you hover over the portrait.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.name: Show exhaustion tracker only on hover.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionOnHover.hint: Enable to only show the exhaustion tracker when you hover over the portrait.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.HpBar.name: Disable health bar.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.HpBar.hint: Enable to hide the colored bar indicating the remaining HP (Health Numbers will still be visible).

TIDYSW5E.Settings.HpOverlay.name: Hide hit point overlay.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.HpOverlay.hint: Enable to hide the HP overlay for this actor type.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitsTogglePc.name: Toggle empty character traits.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitsTogglePc.hint: By default empty traits are always visible. Enable to add a toggle button.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitsMovedBelowResour.name: Move traits below resources.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitsMovedBelowResour.hint: Enable to move traits from the left side below resources.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.AmmoEquippedOnly.name: Only show equipped ammunition.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.AmmoEquippedOnly.hint: Enable to only show currently equipped ammunition in Weapon ammo selector.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitsAlwaysShown.name: Always show traits.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.TraitsAlwaysShown.hint: By default empty traits are hidden by a toggle button. Enable to never hide.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.SkillsAlwaysShown.name: Always show skills.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.SkillsAlwaysShown.hint: By default unproficient skills are hidden by a toggle button. Enable to never hide.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ActiveEffectsMarker.name: Show Active Effects Marker on items.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ActiveEffectsMarker.hint: Enable if you want to see if items have active effects on them (only for list view).

TIDYSW5E.Settings.RightClick.name: Disable right click context menu.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.RightClick.hint: In case of module conflicts or preference you can disable the right click context menu. Items will show a menu icon instead.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExpandedSheet.name: Expanded Limited view for character sheets.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExpandedSheet.hint: Displays the entire character sheet (minus the journal) to players with limited permission.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.PortraitStyle.name: Round portrait style.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.PortraitStyle.hint: Choose to enable round portraits/icons for actors.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.HpOverlayBorder.name: Offset hit point overlay.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.HpOverlayBorder.hint: Enter offset value to compensate for portrait frames and prevent tinting.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.EditTotalLock.name: Lock down sensitive fields.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.EditTotalLock.hint: Enable to prevent accidentally changing sensible, mostly static values.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.EditGmAlways.name: GM can always edit PC sheets.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.EditGmAlways.hint: Enable to allow GMs to edit PC sheets without toggling the sheet lock.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.EditEffectsGmOnly.name: Only GM can edit active effects.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.EditEffectsGmOnly.hint: Enable to deny players to edit active effects on their sheets. They will still see applied effects.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.QuantityAlwaysShown.name: Always show item quantity.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.QuantityAlwaysShown.hint: Enable to never hide item quantity.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.InspirationDisabled.name: Disable inspiration tracker.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.InspirationDisabled.hint: If your campaign doesn't use inspiration you can disable the tracker completely.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionEffects.name: Auto Exhaustion effects.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionEffects.hint: Choose how to apply exhaustion effects corresponding to tiers (requires midiQol for disadvantage rolls)
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionEffects.tidysw5e: TidySW5e - Apply integrated effects (uses Active Effects)
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionEffects.custom: Custom - Use your own effects (requires CUB)

TIDYSW5E.Settings.CustomExhaustionIcon.name: Custom exhaustion effect icon.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.CustomExhaustionIcon.hint: Set your custom exhaustion effect icon by providing an image url. Only available when Exhaustion Effect is set to "tidy 5e" (e. g.: modules/tidysw5e-sheet/images/exhaustion.svg).

TIDYSW5E.Settings.CustomExhaustionEffect.name: Custom CUB exhaustion effect name.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.CustomExhaustionEffect.hint: Set the name for your custom Exhaustion Effect - must be the same as defined in CUB but WITHOUT tier number. (e. g. "Exhaustion")
TIDYSW5E.Settings.CustomExhaustionEffect.tiers: Number of custom CUB exhaustion tiers. Default = 5
TIDYSW5E.Settings.CustomExhaustionEffect.warning: Can't find actor token to apply exhaustion effect to!

TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionDisabled.name: Disable exhaustion tracker.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.ExhaustionDisabled.hint: If your campaign doesn't use exhaustion you can disable the tracker completely.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.RestingForNpcs.name: Resting for NPCs.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.RestingForNpcs.hint: Enable to shows the rest icon/buttons on NPC sheets.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.RestingForNpcsChat.name: Hide chat card for NPC rest.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.RestingForNpcsChat.hint: Enable to hide the Chat Card for NPC rest (applies to GM and Players).

TIDYSW5E.Settings.LinkMarker.name: Mark linked/unlinked NPCs.
TIDYSW5E.Settings.LinkMarker.hint: Adds a colored border and icon to linked/unliked NPC sheets.

TIDYSW5E.Settings.DefaultActionsTab.name: Default Tab when opening a sheet for the first time.
